articles.title: Doctor treating Omicron in South Africa: 'We are over the curve' - Cheatham County Exchange
articles.description: Dr. Angelique Coetzee, one of the first doctors in South Africa to treat patients infected with the Omicron variant, joins CNN New Day to share information on the decline in cases in the country where Omicron was first detected.
